    Builder for MemPersisters.

    • Method Detail

      • configureExitOnDeadlock

        public MemPersister.Builder configureExitOnDeadlock(SchedulerConfig schedulerConfig)
        Configures whether any deadlocks should result in exiting the scheduler process. By default, if this is not called then exiting on deadlock is enabled.
        Returns:
        this

      • disableLocking

        MemPersister.Builder disableLocking()
        Disables thread locking. This should only be invoked by PersisterCache which has its own locking. Calling this also implies disabling the exit-on-deadlock feature.
        Returns:
        this

      • setData

        MemPersister.Builder setData(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,byte[]> data)
        Assigns some initial data to be stored in the created instance. This should only be invoked by PersisterCache which may have previous data to be reloaded.
        Parameters:
        data - a mapping of path to raw data
        Returns:
        this

      • build

        public MemPersister build()
